sentence: She is among 10 guest speakers — a roster that includes Arizona Republican Reps. Andy Biggs, Paul Gosar and Debbie Lesko — along with Ms. Ward, Alveda King and Mike Lindell, CEO of My Pillow.
author: Jennifer Harper
title: Trump rally brings joy, high-profile guests to Arizona Republicans

sentence: — Congresswoman Debbie Lesko (@RepDLesko) January 25, 2022 Texas Senator Ted Cruz wrote on Twitter, “The Biden-Harris Administration is rolling out the red carpet for illegal aliens.” The Biden-Harris Administration is rolling out the red carpet for illegal aliens.
author: Chris Donaldson
title: Shocking video shows mostly adult male illegals released and then taken to TX airport

sentence: There are right-wing politicians using extremist talking points to attack Democrats on immigration and the southern border, and then there’s Debbie Lesko.
title: There are lies about migrants and the border, and then there's Arizona Rep. Debbie Lesko

sentence: Well, both of them have been distracted with Boebert tweeting about masks and Ted fretting about Mickey and Pluto getting it on, so House Freedom Caucus member Rep. Debbie Lesko (R-AZ) stepped in and fill the void.
author: Kimberly Ricci
title: Rep. Debbie Lesko Gave Lauren Boebert A Run For Her Mockery With A Claim About Migrants That’s Being Dragged Hard

sentence: And you wonder why Ron DeSantis, Greg Abbott, and others are so keen to burn math textbooks... Arizona's Republican Congresswoman Debbie Lesko said on Twitter that Border Patrol agents had arrested a billion people at the U.S.-Mexico border over the past six months—wrongly adding three zeros to the correct number of a million people.
author: Ed Scarce
title: AZ Rep Bashed On Twitter, Says A Billion Migrants Apprehended At Border
